cellDesc.GO: Each time you pass or land on GO, you collect 2,000 Tinh Tuy.
cellDesc.KHI_VAN: Draw a Luck card â€” you may receive a reward, penalty, or special effect.
cellDesc.CO_HOI: Draw a Chance card â€” an opportunity for money, special movement, or a surprise event.
cellDesc.TAX: Pay tax based on your buildings: 500 TT per house, 1,000 TT per hotel.
cellDesc.FESTIVAL: Choose one of your properties to host a festival â€” its rent is permanently multiplied by Ã—1.5.
cellDesc.TRAVEL: Travel! Choose any cell on the board to move there instantly.
cellDesc.ISLAND: The Island â€” a forced retreat. Roll doubles, pay 500 TT, or use an escape card to leave.
cellDesc.GO_TO_ISLAND: You are sent to the Island immediately! You do not collect GO salary.
cellDesc.STATION: Station â€” Rent = (stations owned Ã— 250) Ã— (1 + 20% Ã— round). More stations and rounds = higher rent!
cellDesc.UTILITY: Utility â€” Rent = purchase price Ã— (1 + 5% Ã— round). Rent automatically increases 5% each round past GO.
